subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Gomez, 36, who had 181 goals in his 1,066-game N.H.L. career, winning two Stanley Cups with the Devils, hopes to work his way up from the A.H.L.’s Hershey Bears.
snippet: Gomez, 36, who had 181 goals in his 1,066-game N.H.L. career, winning two Stanley Cups with the Devils, hopes to work his way up from the A.H.L.’s Hershey Bears.
